about_the_game:
In a dark world where corporations copyright anything and everything, one company goes too far. The goblins of Gooblin have patented three colors, and no one in the world can ever use them again.

You are a heroic and stealthy sheep. You dare to break into Gooblin headquarters in order to reach to roof and destroy all their patents and IP. In order to avoid being caught you utilize dye to quickly change the color of your wool. You must change your color to match whatever goblins you encounter, that way you blend in and stay undetected. You must also avoid all security measures that Gooblin has, whatever they may be.

This top down stealth/puzzle game is fast paced. With a built in timer and caught counter you can challenge yourself to infiltrate and defeat the evil cooperation Gooblin quickly and undetected to top the leaderboards. The game features accessibility for color blind individuals, as color is an important mechanic of the game.

name: Dye Hard

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A heroic sheep dyes its wool to blend in and infiltrate's a cooperation run by goblins. These goblins have taken copyright law too far and must be stopped!
